Administratively, Hui'an is a county in Quanzhou prefecture, and the term "Hui'an" can refer either to the county or to the town that is its main center. The area is a mixture or urban and rural. County population is around a million, and about 300,000 of those are in the town.
Hui'an is on the main highway going north from Quanzhou to
and not far out of Quanzhou. There are plenty of buses, but not all long-distance buses stop in Hui'an; some just fly past on the limited-access divided highway.
The most scenic area in the county is
, an old walled town with beaches.
